channel.title: The Observation Deck
channel.description: Views on software from Bryan Cantrill's deck chair

item.title: TR35
item.description: So MIT's Technology Review has named me as one of their TR35 -- the top 35 innovators under the age of thirty-five. It's a great honor, especially because the other honorees are actually working on things like cures for cancer and rocket science -- domains that I have known only as rhetorical flourish. Should you like to hear me make a jackass out of myself on the subject, you might want to check out Richard Giles's latest I/O podcast, in which he interviewed me about the award.
item.dc:creator: Bryan Cantrill
